Author: CheetoFluff
Text: I’m in the same boat. It’s crazy how quickly things fall apart when these apps are thrown back into the mix. Maybe try to follow some BoPo blogs and pro recovery blogs so that you’re seeing them in the mix. I find that seeing enough “good” content steers me back in the right direction, even if it’s just the difference between fasting for days and fasting for hours. PM if you need additional encouragement to delete. It’s hard but you are not your ED and you deserve better than the toxic BS both these apps provide.
